title: What to know before Japan releases water from Fukushima nuclear plant
description: Japan plans to release more than 1 million metric tons of treated radioactive water from the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear plant. Here's what to know.

title: Why did the Dutch government collapse over a refugee policy dispute?
description: Prime Minister Mark Rutte and his cabinet resigned after the coalition failed to agree on how to restrict migration amid a surge in asylum applications.

title: The mystery of the Ain Dubai, the world’s largest (broken) Ferris wheel
description: It has been more than a year since the world’s tallest Ferris wheel stopped turning. Officials in Dubai won’t say why.

title: Ukraine live briefing: Biden defends cluster munitions decision; Erdogan expresses support for Kyiv’s bid to join NATO
description: Ukraine is "running out of ammunition," Biden told reporters after the administration's decision to supply Kyiv with the controversial weapons.

title: Kremlin smears Wagner boss Prigozhin, hailing Putin as Russia’s savior
description: Kremlin spinmasters are working to discredit Yevgeniy Prigozhin after his failed rebellion and to prop up President Vladimir Putin, who agreed to drop insurgency charges.

title: White House defends sending up to hundreds of thousands of cluster shells to Ukraine
description: As the Biden administration authorizes the controversial transfer, Kyiv promises they will not be used near civilians.
